item.description: A piece of ground intended to be used next some slopes. This items works like a slope. That is, the other item is aligned only if the X-coordinate of his center of mass is in the range covered by the current item.

field.name: straight_slope.top_side_is_active
field.description: Tell if the top side is active.

field.name: straight_slope.bottom_side_is_active
field.description: Tell if the bottom side is active.

field.name: straight_slope.margin
field.description: The tolerance between the position of the other item and the current item for alignments. Positive value means that the margin is outside the block.
